channel.title: Insert Objects in Whiteboard on Quickly How Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Insert Objects in Whiteboard on Quickly How Tutorials

item.title: How to Insert Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Change an Ink Object to a Shape: With Click With Keyboard How to Insert a Sticky Note: With Click With Right Click From a Note Grid How to Insert a Note Grid How to Insert a Reaction: With Click Into a Sticky Note How to Insert Text: With Click With Right Click How to Insert Shapes How to Undo: With Click With Keyboard How to Redo: With Click With Keyboard No time to scroll down?

item.title: How to Use the Eraser and Highlighter in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Select the Eraser: With Click With Keyboard How to Change Eraser Width How to Change Eraser Stroke: How to Erase Entire Stroke How to Erase Partial Stroke How to Select the Highlighter: With Click With Keyboard How to Change Highlighter Width How to Change Highlighter Color: To Default Colors To Custom Colors No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a video tutorial:

item.title: How to Use Ink Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Switch to Inking Mode: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Insert an Ink Object How to Switch the Pen: How to Switch to the First Pen With Click How to Switch to the First Pen With Keyboard Shortcut How to Switch to the Second Pen With Click How to Switch to the Second Pen With Keyboard Shortcut How to Switch to the Third Pen With Click How to Switch to the Third Pen With Keyboard Shortcut How to Switch to the Single Arrow Tip With Click How to Switch to the Single Arrow Tip With Keyboard Shortcut How to Switch to the Double Arrow Tip With Click How to Switch to the Double Arrow Tip With Keyboard Shortcut How to Draw Straight Lines: With Ruler With Keyboard With Touch Screen How to Change Pen Width How to Change Pen Opacity: By Default With Menu How to Change Pen Color: To Default Colors To Custom Colors No time to scroll down?
